title: Video Game Design
description: Techniques for electronic game design and programming, including graphics game engines, motion generation, behavioral control for autonomous characters, interaction structure, social and interface issues of multi-user play, and the business aspects of game development.  Credit not allowed for both CS 4455 and CS 6457.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 3451 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
